column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.No further coronavirus-related deaths have been recorded in Northern Ireland for a second day by the Department of Health
column2: meaning the total number of deaths remains at 2
column3: 107.An additional 183 people have tested positive for Covid-19 following tests on 2
column4: 890 individuals.There are 153 people in hospital with coronavirus as of midnight
column5: 14 are in intensive care and 10 are being ventilated.The total number of confirmed coronavirus cases in Northern Ireland is now 116
column6: 515.Last updated 25 March at 14:00 GMT.A total of 703
column7: 334 first vaccine doses have been administered in Northern Ireland
column9: 907 people receiving a second dose.The total number of vaccines administered is 808
